div.div: at River Forest, IL | Concordia Stadium

tr.td: Concordia wins toss, defers option. Rockford receives going N to S.
Colapietro kickoff 64 yards to the RU1, Arnold, Ja return 30 yards to the RU31 (Reger;Loubriel).
